problem.markdown:
Same set-up as above: Design a simply-supported beam with a span of 10m that supports a distributed load of 50kN/m.
>>Where along the length of the beam is the moment the greatest?<< ( ) At the supports ( ) At the quarter point (x) At the midspan ( ) None of the above
[explanation] The bending moment is greatest at the midspan or middle of the beam. Moment tends to increase as the distance from the support or load increases. [explanation]
